entries.title: Joe Biden Can’t Quit the Saudi “Pariahs”
entries.description:
Despite his campaign pledges, the president has continued to back Saudi Arabia and its murderous de facto ruler.

The post Joe Biden Can’t Quit the Saudi “Pariahs” appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: Federal Prisons Failed to Stop a Pattern of Sexual Abuse Against Women
entries.description:
A Senate investigation found that the Bureau of Prisons did not "prevent, detect, and stop recurring sexual abuse in at least four federal prisons, including abuse by senior prison officials.”

The post Federal Prisons Failed to Stop a Pattern of Sexual Abuse Against Women appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: How Neighbors in the Borderlands Fought Back Against Arizona Gov. Doug Ducey’s Illegal Wall — and Won
entries.description:
The Biden administration is doing nothing to stop the environmental destruction wrought by Arizona’s construction of a shipping container wall.

The post How Neighbors in the Borderlands Fought Back Against Arizona Gov. Doug Ducey’s Illegal Wall — and Won appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: Bernie Sanders Pulls Yemen War Powers Resolution Amid Opposition From White House
entries.description:
Sanders pledged to work with the Biden administration on compromise language, and bring the resolution back to the floor if talks failed.

The post Bernie Sanders Pulls Yemen War Powers Resolution Amid Opposition From White House appeared first on The Intercept.
